English:
<color=orange>Precision damage bonus</color>
Short Range
Quick
Medium damage
Description: A short description of what advantages melee weapons have, and how they're used. I.e. they can be used to kill enemies silently (as opposed to firearms which are loud), it requires you to be close to the target, and you can charge up the attack to make it more powerful.
